about_the_game:
STORY

You are Nina, a young street worker who has been kidnapped by an evil pharmaceutical company called MEDIO.

MEDIO has been kidnapping up to 100 street workers with the complicity of the mayor James Hugh. MEDIO want to experiment a new cream that can bring back the youth of their customers they call it the venus cream. 

The lead scientist is Alice Raup and she had no pity for the young street workers used as guinea pigs for the program NovoVenus.

They realized at some point that most of the experiment subjects has developed some very disturbing symptoms:

Skin decomposition

Hunger increased

Aggressiveness

Violence

Great resistance to pain

The evacuation protocol has been applied against the potential lost of control of the building linked to the NovoVenus program.

GAME FEATURES:

You will control one character , NINA, with the help of Eddy the Network administrator who have hacked the system, you will try to stop the program NovoVenus and get out of the building. 

You can will collect objects that will allow you to fight against the zombies and open all closed door.

You will be able to manipulate a small pistol that can help you eliminate some zombies depending of the munitions you will find on your way

The game allow you to modify your appearence such as hair color or body colours and even the size of some body parts.

You need to follow the instructions given by the network administrator and you should be able to get out the building.

Each level will bring its own challenge such as item to find or zombie to kill.

You can die in this game and if it happens you will be forced to restart the entire game!

Also the game is bloody and show realistic violence with gore.

content_descriptors.notes: The character is lightly dressed. The mirror allow you to modify the size of some body part.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: XP/ Vista / Windows 7 / Windows 8
  • Processor: 2 GHz Intel Dual Core processor / 2.6 GHz Intel Single Core processor
  • Graphics: 512 MB DirectX 9.0c compatible card
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • VR Support: Mouse and Keyboard

  • OS: windows 11
  • Processor: 11th Gen Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-11400H / 2.70GHz 2.69 GHz
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce FTX 3060

short_description: AFFRAID est un jeu d'horreur à la troisième personne dans lequel vous explorez des couloirs et combattez des zombies. Les mécanismes de combat sont fortement inspiré par le jeu Resident evil 3. Le personnage principal est plutôt sexy.
